title: ‘We could have a problem’ POWERGEN 2026’s second Keynote takes stock of the grid
description: At the Tuesday afternoon Keynote at POWERGEN 2026, hosted in San Antonio, Texas, energy executives shared how their regions are responding to grid challenges.
content: At the Tuesday afternoon Keynote at POWERGEN 2026, hosted in San Antonio, Texas, energy executives shared how their regions are responding to grid challenges.
